# Introduction

The package demuxmix ...


# Quick start

```{r setup}
library(demuxmix)
library(SingleCellExperiment)
library(DropletUtils)
library(scuttle)
library(scRNAseq)
library(ggplot2)


htoExp <- StoeckiusHashingData(type="mixed")
eDrops <- emptyDrops(counts(htoExp))
htoExp <- htoExp[, which(eDrops$FDR <= 0.001)]

```

```{r setup2}
qc <- perCellQCMetrics(htoExp)
dmm <- demuxmix(assay(altExp(htoExp)), rna=qc$detected)
dmmSummary(dmm$results)
plotDmmHistogram(dmm$model[[1]], binwidth = 1) + coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0, 0.02), xlim=c(0, 150))
```
